thread.title: Teenage boy arrested for attempting to abduct minor girl
thread.title_full: Teenage boy arrested for attempting to abduct minor girl

author: @Our Correspondent
title: Teenage boy arrested for attempting to abduct minor girl
text: Police arrested on Thursday a teenage boy for allegedly attempting to abduct a minor girl with the intention of sexually assaulting her. The 14-year-old suspect, whose name has been withheld for being a juvenile, was arrested after police intercepted him with a minor girl in the Aram Bagh area. Upon questioning, police found out that the tteenager had attempted to abduct the nine-year-old girl for sexually assaulting her. The initial interrogation revealed that the suspect possessed a criminal record. He was previously arrested for stealing a motorcycle within the remits of the Nabi Bux police station. A case has been registered against him while further investigations are underway. Sindh’s caretaker chief minister on Thursday said a security force of 133,000 police, Rangers and army officials...
